description:
Discover a new generation of skincare, with Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex. This iconic serum has been updated and improved to take advantage of modern skincare technologies, all while retaining the same benefits you know and love. 
Created to address all signs of ageing from fine lines to loss of firmness, this serum works night and day to provide more hydration, brightening and anti-oxidant protection than ever before. From the very first dropper, skin is left looking radiant and hydrated, and over time looks firmer and more even.

What does Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex do?

  • Addresses all signs of ageing
  • Promotes radiance
  • Hydrates skin for 72 hours
  • Evens skintone
  • Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
  • Helps boost collagen product for firmer skin
  • Minimises the appearance of pores
  • Provides 8 hours of antioxidant protection
  • Helps boost the skin’s natural nightly repair processes

  • After just one dropper, skin is left radiant and full of hydration.
  • After three weeks, lines and wrinkles look reduced. 88% of women said skin looked more youthful1.
  • After one 50ml bottle, skin feels firmer. 89% of women agreed1. Pores appear diminished, and skin looks bouncy and full of life.

Who is Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex for?

This new and improved formula can be used by all skin types.Designed to target all signs of ageing including loss of firmness, wrinkles and fine lines, uneven texture, dullness and dehydration, this serum is suitable for all skin types.

What new skincare technology is in Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex?

  • Chronolux Power Signal Technology
    Powered by a peptide ferment and plant-derived ingredients, this complex helps boost the skin’s ability to defend and repair itself from harsh environmental aggressors. It also promotes collagen production and cell renewal, helping to smooth, tone and firm skin.

How do I apply Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair serum?

Apply morning and night, after cleansing but before moisturising.Use one dropper, and smooth gently over face and throat.
For an indulgent moment of self-care, try the Esteé Lauder Heart Ritual.Begin by applying a full dropper of Advanced Night Repair to the palm of your hand.Massage into the face in a heart shape: Using all fingers of both hands, start at the centre of the face and move out to your ears. Glide hands from the sides of your face down to your chin.Next, trace a larger heart, from the middle of your forehead to your temples. Glide down the sides of the face and finish under the chin.Finish the ritual by gently massaging serum onto your neck in a downward motion.

Is Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair paraben free?

Yes - this new and improved formula is now paraben-free, as well as being free from sulfates, sulfites, phthalates, mineral oil and fragrance.

What else should I know about  Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair serum?

  • Now in a recyclable glass bottle
  • Patented until 2033
  • Oil-free
  • Dermatologist-tested
  • Ophthalmologist-tested
  • Non-acnegenic; won't clog pores
  • Fragrance-free
  • Free of parabens, phthalates, sulfites, sulfates and mineral oil
  • 50ml
  • Also available in 30ml and 75ml


1 Consumer testing on 543 women.
ingredients: Water\Aqua\Eau, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Peg-8, Propanediol, Bis-peg-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Methyl Gluceth-20, Glycereth-26, Peg-75, Butylene Glycol, Adansonia Digitata Seed Extract, Tripeptide-32, Sodium Hyaluronate, Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Lactobacillus Ferment, Cola Acuminata (Kola) Seed Extract, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Algin, Pantethine, Caffeine, Lecithin, Sodium Rna, Bisabolol, Squalane, Glycerin, Oleth-3 Phosphate, Caprylyl Glycol, Oleth-3, Oleth-5, Choleth-24, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Jojoba Wax Peg-120 Esters, Ceteth-24, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Tetrasodium Edta, Bht, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Red 4 (Ci 14700), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140)
short_description: A day and night repair serum that promotes hydration and radiance while targeting the signs of ageing.
name_raw: Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex 50ml
name: Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex 50ml
